string-array.name: mock_interview
string-array.item: Mock Interview

string-array.name: connect_karo
string-array.item: Connect Karo
Think beyond the boundaries!
Take a moment to sit back and show your intensity to resilience over networks and create a connectivity. Get greared up to put forth your views!

There will be 2 rounds.
	1. The participants are expected to connect two or more images to get on the word.
	2. Individual participation is entertained.
	The words given will be non-technical.
Event head: 9488079159

string-array.name: futsal
string-array.item: Futsal
Everyone loses game. Few change them.

* College ID is must
	* Last date of registration is Sep 10, 2019.
	* 5+3 players per team
	* Knock out based matches.
	* Referees decision is final.
	* team should be punctual for the reporting time.
	* For registration please contact the number given below.
Ajith Kumar\u00A0\u00A0: 9840543412\nShiva Kumar : 8056918077

string-array.name: paper_boat
string-array.item: Paper Boat
Let your mind write your paper, not your hands.

Here is an amazing opportunity to showcase your ideas on an unique and massive platform in the form of well integrated and intriguing presentation. It strives to explore the inquisitiveness of young minds by giving their incredulous ideas a definitive direction.

The topics for the paper presentation are
 * Blockchain
 * Cloud Computing
 * Artificial Intelligence
 * Machine Learning
 * Ethical hacking
 * Image Processing
 * Bio Computers
 * Augmented Reality
 * Dark Web
 * Other topics related to IT Industry

Abstract should be sent before
September 10 in IEEE format.
Email\u00A0\u00A0\u00A0\u00A0 : flaminius@gmail.com\nSubject : Paper Presentation

string-array.name: code_hunt
string-array.item: Code Hunt
Life would be much easier, if I had the source code
It is true to bring out the best within a techie should be challenged. Here is the place to check out the intensity of your code thirst, get ready to explore the talent

* A team with 3 members can participate
	* This fixture consists of 2 round.
	* Problem statement is put out of sight to the searching guys outside the lab.
	* After the problem statement is found out the message is passed through mobile to the pupil in the lab.
	* Time span for the 1st round lasts for 10 mins and for the 2nd round be 20 mins.

string-array.name: techno_guess
string-array.item: Techno Guess
Action speak louder than words
Tweaking it on our convenience, we challenge you charades to speak louder than workds and stun us with you 'dumb' act by registering yourselves here!

* Each action will have 1 min to perform
	* 2 to 4 members from a team should participate.
	* The performed acting will pass to the next team, if the team has no answer.
	* The actor should not act any action and individual alphabets.
	* The actor should not perform "singing, clipping. humming, whistling…".
	* The non-enrolled "teams" or "participants" will not allowed playing Dumb Charades.

string-array.name: web_designing
string-array.item: Web Designing
If you think Maths is hard, try Web Design

Technology over technique produces emotionless design. In consideration of exploring the art of cart, we handover to you this intimating event where the participants are expected to create an awe-inspiring web page.

\t* In the preliminary level, participants will be given a web design from which they are expected to guess the correct code.\n\t* Participants qualified for the next level will be given a theme for which an exceptional website must be created.

string-array.name: mind_o_pedias
string-array.item: Mind O Pedias
First computer virus?\nFirst web browser?\nFirst search engine?

Far from classroom rote, this quiz is all about work of science and technology.
Get ready for a roller coaster rider into the intense work of techno quizzing.

\t* A team with 2 members can participate.\n\t* This fixture consists of 2 rounds.\n\t* Time span for the 1st round lasts for 10 mins with 20 questions and the second round will be general quiz with 10 questions for 10 minutes.

string-array.name: google_it
string-array.item: Google It
Your mission is to crack the Riddle and figure out the word it implies.

* Only one can participate along with your mobile phone which should have a proper Internet connection\t\n* Answer need to be entered in stipulated time.\t\n* You can use Google to find out the Answer.

string-array.name: covert_buggy
string-array.item: Covert Buggy
Its not a Bug - Its an Undocumented feature

\t* In the preliminary round the participants need to resolve the bugs of pre-filled code in stipulated time.\n\t* In the Second round the participants are expected to correct the compilation error and end up with the corresponding output.\n\t* Only two participants per team are permitted.

string-array.name: snap_it_on
string-array.item: Snap It On
Photography is the practise of photographing guests and occurrences at any Event or Occasion where one may hire a photographer for.

\t* Participant should send their snaps to our Email ID along with their Name, Year, Phone number.\n\t* Last date of this event is September 11, 2019.\n\t* Photos are selected based on likes and snaps.
Email\u00A0\u00A0\u00A0\u00A0 : flaminius@gmail.com\nSubject : Snap It On

string-array.name: cinema_verite
string-array.item: Cinema Verite
The way to find a needle in a hay stacks is to sit down

Do you have the pristine and unexplored themes that will stimulate the audience to sit up and think? Or the fiery dialogues that can cause rapturous silence followed by momentous applause? This is the platform just for you and only you can do it..!

* Entries must be in .mp4 format.
	* Total running time must be less than 5 minutes, including front and back credits.
	* No abusive content is permitted.
	* The competition is open only for students.
	* The last date for submission is Sep 11, 2019.
	* Post your entries to flaminius2k19@gmail.com
Email\u00A0\u00A0\u00A0\u00A0 : flaminius@gmail.com\nSubject : Short film

string-array.name: pubg
string-array.item: PUBG

Map\u00A0\u00A0\u00A0\u00A0\u00A0\u00A0\t\t\t\t: Erangel
Mode\u00A0\u00A0\u00A0\t\t\t\t\t: TPP
Match Date\t: 13th September 2019
Match Time\t: 14:00 IST [2 PM IST]
Entry Fee\u00A0\t\t: INR 100 per Squad

Procedure To Join:

 * Entry Fee: INR 100 per Squad
 * Payment can be done via googlepay or cash
 * Whatsapp group will be created with one person per team.
 * Room id and password will be send in group
 * Check group in case of room closed

Note:

This match will only be conducted if we get at least 15 Squad registration.
In case this doesn’t happen we’ll refund the amount to respective team Captains.
 * Join the lobby 10 mins before the match starts
 * Match will be started exactly at the time mentioned
 * Take the screenshot of the result

Rules:

 * Emulators are not allowed or you will be kicked and Even if a single player violates the rules, the whole squad will be disqualified.
 * Hacks are not allowed.
 * We will provide your team with slot no, if you or your teammate join any other slot then will be kicked.
 * Dont try to enter the spectate area as it is only for admin.
 * Dont try to team up with others.
 * Tournament organizers decision is final.

Prize:

 Prize Pool 1500 INR
 Winning Team : INR 1000
 Runner-up  : INR 500
